## Translations for the livetables column titles extension.repository.emptyvalue= extension.repository.name=Name extension.repository.summary=Summary extension.repository.type=Type extension.repository.category=Category extension.repository.authors=Authors extension.repository.doc.creationDate=Created On extension.repository.doc.date=Last Modified extension.repository.rating=Rating extension.repository.installedCount=Installs
## Administration UI admin.repository=Extension Repository
## Support repository.support.createsupporter=Register
## Supporters repository.supporter.sheet.description=This page controls how ExtensionSupporter pages are displayed in both view and edit modes. repository.supporter.sheet.noObject=The current page doesn't have the expected ExtensionSupporter object. repository.supporter.sheet.createplan=Add
repository.supporter.sheet.plans=Plans
ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_emptyvalue= ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_doc.title=Name ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_summary=Summary ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_url=URL ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_email=Email ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_content=Details ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupporterClass_active=Active
## Support plans repository.supportplan.sheet.description=This page controls how ExtensionSupportPlan pages are displayed in both view and edit modes. repository.supportplan.sheet.noObject=The current page doesn't have the expected ExtensionSupportPlan object.
ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_emptyvalue= ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_doc.title=Name ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_supporter=Supporter ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_summary=Summary ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_url=URL ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_content=Details ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_active=Active ExtensionCode.ExtensionSupportPlanClass_paying=Paying
